Name: Seq - Log Deployment
Description: Post details of the deployment to a [Seq](https://getseq.net) log server. Add this as the last step in a process, and ensure it is set to run always (on success and failure).
Author: nblumhardt

Parameters.Name: SeqServerUrl
Parameters.Label: Seq server URL
Parameters.HelpText: The URL of the Seq server.

Parameters.Name: SeqApiKey
Parameters.Label: Seq API key
Parameters.HelpText: If an [API key](http://docs.getseq.net/docs/api-keys) is required for writing events, specify it here.
